mapper.insert: INSERT INTO permissions (id, group_id, permission_name, display_name, description, created_at) VALUES (#{id}, #{groupId}, #{permissionName}, #{displayName}, #{description}, #{createdAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE permissions SET group_id = #{groupId}, permission_name = #{permissionName}, display_name = #{displayName}, description = #{description}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT p.*, g.display_name as group_name FROM permissions AS p LEFT JOIN permission_groups AS g ON g.id = p.group_id WHERE p.id = #{id}
SELECT id FROM permissions WHERE permission_name = #{permissionName}
SELECT id FROM permissions WHERE display_name = #{displayName}
